164.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

64.movie_plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

120.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
120.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

167.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

104.movie_plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

24.movie_plot: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

148.movie_plot: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

113.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
113.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

131.movie_plot: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

52.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

98.movie_plot: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

25.movie_name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)
25.movie_plot: After an accidental encounter with otherworldly vessels, an ordinary man follows a series of psychic clues to the first scheduled meeting between representatives of Earth and visitors from the cosmos.

156.movie_plot: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

19.movie_plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

93.movie_plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action, while attempting to liberate a twelve-year-old prostitute.

51.movie_plot: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain with an unscrupulous sea-witch in order to meet a human prince on land.

3.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

127.movie_plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

95.movie_plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

21.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
21.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

180.movie_plot: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

134.movie_plot: A boy inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

108.movie_plot: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

124.movie_plot: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

146.movie_plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

54.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

101.movie_plot: Wallace takes a break from trying to decide on a holiday destination only to find he has no cheese for his crackers. The solution to both problems is a trip to the moon, with dog Gromit, because everybody knows the moon's made of cheese.

159.movie_plot: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

32.movie_plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

89.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

71.movie_plot: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

116.movie_plot: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

166.movie_plot: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.
